name: Fridge Organizing
description:
Have you finished shopping in the supermarket? Cool!
Now it's time to do a shopping sort of the groceries and fill the fridge!
Fridge Organizing is a super satisfying after the shopping game where you can take all your groceries and set them up the way you like it in order to fill the fridge!
Sounds fun? It is! Start the shopping sort of your groceries and fill the fridge in the coolest fridge organizing game!

To opt out of CrazyLabs sales of personal information as a California resident, please visit our Privacy Policy: https://crazylabs.com/app
